verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My God loves me,
his love will never end,
he rests within my heart,
for my God loves me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
His gentle hand,
he stretches over me
though storm,
clouds threaten the day,
he will set me free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He comes to me,
in sharing bread and wine,
he brings me life
that will reach,
past the end of time.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My God loves me,
his faithful love endures,
and I will live like a child,
held in love secure.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The joys of love,
as offerings we bring,
the pains of love
will be lost,
in the praise we sing.
